info.title: Winters End
info.author: ThatOtherPerson
info.details:
You are a snow person and spring has come to rob you of yourself and make you disappear. But you don't need to melt away into a puddle. Gather up what snow still remains on the ground and you can be even bigger then you where before.

Controls:
Hold the wiimote sideways like an NES controller and tilt it to move.
Use the directional pad to control the camera.

Author:
ThatOtherPerson (thatotherperson@yahoo.com)
ThatOtherDev.com

music (Winter Dreams) by Grace Click
